scripts.build: tsc && node postbuild.cjs && mkdir -p bin/napi-v3/darwin/arm64 && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v3/darwin/arm64/* bin/napi-v3/darwin/arm64/ && mkdir -p build/Release && cp node_modules/sharp/build/Release/sharp-darwin-arm64v8.node build/Release/ && cp -r node_modules/sharp/vendor ./vendor
scripts.test: bun test && bun run vitest run
